Each piece of clothing can be overlaid onto a different person so that the letters match up.

Each clothing item is of a specific type. For example, PANAMA is a type of a HAT. The crossword clue answers can "wear" the clothing types in order to form a new word. For example, the answer RED can wear HAT to get HATRED.
Index into the combined words by the number on each piece of clothing. Read in the order of the pieces of clothing.
